plot: A bored art-collecting Manhattan couple invite an interesting aging cosmetics saleswoman to enliven their dull lives by directing sex and death &"games.&" Featuring a corpse encased in plaster and displayed in the living room as art, and a triple-cross ending.   Written by  alfiehitchie
title: La muerte llama a la puerta
plot_es: A bored art-collecting Manhattan couple invite an interesting aging cosmetics saleswoman to enliven their dull lives by directing sex and death &"games.&" Featuring a corpse encased in plaster and displayed in the living room as art, and a triple-cross ending.   Written by  alfiehitchie
